name: Chasm Crawl
description: Chasm Crawl is a First-Person Action-Adventure game where you will journey into a region known as The Monster Vale. Explore a large Over World filled with strange monsters and dangerous dungeons. On your journey you can collect useful resources and power ups in order to battle the numerous creatures that you come across. Maintaining your resources such as Bombs, Health Potions and Mana Potions is the key to victory in this fast-paced fantasy game. There are many strange and powerful enemies in the Monster Vale, gain experience points and level up stats to get an advantage over some of these goofy but dangerous monsters. Travel to The Monster Vale and uncover the source of the miasma that is causing the citizens of this normally peaceful region to become hostile in Chasm Crawl.
